MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA12  postcode area of Irvine. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11am to carry out repairs on an underground cable fault located on Irvine Bank street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.30am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.45am on 1st February 2021.
